short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search Reddit posts using product info and keywords, and marketing with AI in 1-click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Monitor trending Reddit posts with Redplus AI and use AI for smart posting and replying to enhance product marketing on the Reddit platform.

Redplus AI offers Reddit Monitoring that automatically finds the most relevant posts from Reddit and Google search results based on your keywords. Simply input your product information in advance, and AI will generate natural, human-like replies without any machine translation feel. Additionally, you can use AI for one-click post creation and adjust the tone, language, length, and format at any time. With Redplus AI, you can amplify your brand voice by 10x, attract more users, and achieve natural growth in brand traffic through enhanced Reddit monitoring.

For more details, visit our official website: https://redplus.ai

🎉 Features
● Reddit Keyword Monitoring: Easily track popular posts mentioning your keywords and stay updated on user discussions through Reddit Monitoring. Offers dual monitoring modes to find high-traffic, quality posts from both Reddit and Google search results.
● AI Smart Replies: Generate relevant comments based on post titles, context, and project information to engage and promote your brand appropriately while utilizing Reddit Monitoring.
● AI Post：Automatically generate AI post titles and content that comply with Subreddit rules using background information, completely freeing your hands and mind. You can adjust the style and format at any time, making it suitable for account nurturing and brand promotion.
● Attract Target Traffic: Continuously draw more visitors to your website for concentrated traffic with effective Reddit Monitoring.
● Update!! Multi-Product Management: Supports output of multiple URLs for centralized monitoring of your products and competitors. Instantly parse all website information via URL, including brand names, descriptions, and keywords, to achieve systematic AI SEO management.

👉🏻 How to Use
1. Install the Chrome extension.
2. Enter product links while simultaneously performing AI TDK extraction.
3. Click the 'Start Monitoring' button to begin tracking relevant popular posts under different products at any time.
4. Write up to 5 keywords for your product.
5. Click the “Start Monitoring” button to begin Reddit Monitoring of relevant trending posts.
6. Click on posts in the extension panel to go directly to the Reddit page.
7. Use Redplus’s smart replies in the comments section on Reddit or from the extension panel.
8. Use AI Post to post everything on Reddit.
9. Set detailed options for AI Content (tone, language, length, mention of product info) and send them with one click.
10. Wait for an increase in product traffic...

💡 Q&A
● Q1: What is Redplus?
    ● A1: Redplus is a powerful tool designed for monitoring and engaging on Reddit. It helps users track trending posts, manage customer interactions, and effectively promote their products through Reddit Monitoring.
● Q2: How does Reddit trending post monitoring work?
    ● A2: Redplus intelligently extracts brand terms, descriptions, and keywords from your product links to meet SEO strategies. Then, Redplus tracks relevant discussions on Reddit, providing you with real-time updates and insights through Reddit Monitoring.
● Q3: Do I need to create a Reddit account to use this extension?
    ● A3: Yes, you need a Reddit account to use Redplus. We may offer more account services in the future to address your account needs.

💫 Troubleshooting
You can also message us directly on Twitter or email us at service.redplus.ai@gmail.com.

Note: Redplus is independently developed and is not officially endorsed or affiliated with Reddit.

使用 Redplus AI 对 Reddit 热帖进行监控，并且用 AI 一键智能回复和发帖，赋能 Reddit 平台的产品营销。

Redplus AI 可以让您通过关键词的设置，从 Reddit 站内和 Google 搜索结果中全面而自动化的帮助你筛选出最相关的 Reddit 帖子；同时只需要提前输入您的产品信息，即可实现 AI 一键智能化的生成类人化的回复，没有机翻感。另外你可以使用 Redplus AI 智能生成帖子标题和内容。每个回复或者帖子都可以自由选择是否包含产品信息，也可以自由选择回复的语气风格、语言、长度。使用 Redplus AI 助力你10倍放大您的品牌声音，吸引更多用户，让您的品牌流量达到自然的增长。

欲了解更多详情，您可以访问我们的官方网站：https://redplus.ai，以及功能页面：

🎉 特点
● Reddit 关键词监控：利用关键词，轻松追踪提及它们的热门帖子，随时了解用户的讨论。提供两种监控模式，从 Reddit 和 Google 的搜索结果中找到流量大、质量高的帖子。
● AI 智能回复：根据帖子的标题、上下文和项目信息生成最相关的评论，参与互动，同时适当推广品牌。
● AI 生成帖子：使用背景信息自动生成符合 Subreddit 规则要求的 AI 帖子标题和内容，完全解放您的双手和大脑，并允许您随时调整风格和格式，适合养号和推广品牌。
● 吸引目标流量：持续吸引更多访客访问您的网站，带来集中流量。
● 多产品管理：支持输出多条 URL，对自己的产品和竞品进行集中监控；通过 URL 一键解析网站的全部信息包括 品牌词、描述、关键词，实现 AI SEO 体系化管理。

👉🏻如何使用
● 安装 Chrome 插件
● 填写产品链接，同时进行 AI TDK 提取
● 点击“Start Monitoring”按钮，随时开始监控不同产品下的相关热帖
● 点击插件面板上的帖子直接进入 Reddit 页面
● 你可以在 Reddit 页面的评论区下直接使用 Redplus 的智能回复，也可以在插件面板中使用
● 在 AI Post 中输入背景信息，使用 AI 撰写 Post 的功能
● 通过对 AI 内容详细的设置（语气、语言、长度、是否提及产品信息），一键智能发送回复
● 等待产品流量的增长... ...


💡问答
Q1：什么是 Redplus？
A1：Redplus 是一款专为 Reddit 监控和参与而设计的强大工具。它可以帮助用户跟踪热门帖子、管理客户互动并有效地推广他们的产品。

Q2：Reddit 热帖监控是如何起作用的？
A2：Redplus 通过您的产品链接，为您智能提取品牌词、描述、关键词，满足 SEO 的思维。然后，Redplus 会通过 Reddit 监控 跟踪 Reddit 上的相关讨论，为您提供实时更新和见解。

Q3：我需要创建 Reddit 帐户才能使用此扩展吗？
A3：是的，目前需要您首先具备 Reddit 账户，才可以使用 Redplus 进行赋能。不过后续我们可能会推出更多的账户服务，尽最大限度的解决您的账户问题。
